scripts.build: bun run export-docs && bunx vocs build
scripts.dev: bun run export-docs && bunx vocs dev
scripts.watch:api-docs: nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.py' --ext py --exec 'npm run export:docs && npm run build:api-docs'
scripts.cleanbuildprod: bun run clean && rm -rf node_modules && bun i --production && bun run build
